subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The fiery Sergio García did not win a match in the first two days of competition at the Valhalla Golf Club, while Bob Weekley has become the talisman of the U.S. team.
snippet: The fiery Sergio García did not win a match in the first two days of competition at the Valhalla Golf Club, while Bob Weekley has become the talisman of the U.S. team.
